Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for mission reactions.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

talkParamId.Wiki: The conversation parameter ID to use.

dispLimitNum.Wiki: The maximum number of instances of this reaction.

dispLimitGroupId.Wiki: The group ID to use for the reaction limit.
